name: Mind's Eye Demo
description:
Update: The Demo is now a good bit larger! Please let me know what you think.

Mind's Eye follows the story of Zoa as she travels in search of seven artifacts required to defeat an evil that hasn't been seen in over a century.  She's accompanied on this journey by her best friends, Kalli and Tumri as well as five magical personalities that reside within Zoa, that have been keeping her safe and sound for as long as she could remember. How did this evil get let loose? Well, that will be unveiled way further down in the story. For now, please enjoy this trial.

Mind's Eye is a project that I recently started working on... kind of. I finished writing the story about a year, maybe a year and a half ago . I'm just now finding the time to start working on it and developing it. Right now it's in 2D just to get a brief glimpse of the game out there. 

I created this trial using RPG maker, I'm thinking about making the full game in Unreal Engine and starting this summer, once classes are over and the students are released for summer break then I'll have time to myself to devote to it. However, I wanted to see what you all thought so far so please, leave comments below and please keep the critiques constructive. I've been making games for a little over 7 years now but this would be my first RPG

Controls:

Esc: Menu

Enter: Ok/Action

Movement: Directional Arrows

Just a quick note credit for the artwork used goes to the following RPG Maker content creators: Kadokowa, Tonyedi, and hiddenone and WillOBrien from DeviantArt.
